attributes.action: Ban MPs from having a total separate income above 10% of their annual MP salary.
attributes.additional_details:
Click here to see the long list of our MP's outside interests: 
https://www.publications.parliament.uk/pa/cm/cmregmem/contents1617.htm
attributes.background:
George Osborne is an MP. He also works for Black Rock four days a month, earning an annual salary of £650,000. He's the editor of the Evening Standard
Does he and others like him have time to represent the British people? 
Can he really represent the British people with such conflicting interests?
